titles.title: Jesus Cast A Look On Me (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus cast a look on me Give me sweet simplicity Make me poor and keep me low Seeking only Thee to know{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Weaned from all my lordly self Weaned from all the miser's pelf Weaned from all the scorner's ways Weaned from all the lust of praise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All that feeds my busy pride Cast it evermore aside Bid my will to Thine submit Lay me humbly at Thy feet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make me like a little child Of my strength and wisdom spoiled Seeing only in Thy light Walking only in Thy might{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Leaning on Thy loving breast Where a weary soul may rest Feeling well the peace of God Flowing from Thy precious blood{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In this posture let me live And hosannas daily give In this temper let me die And hosannas ever cry{/lang-eng}
